categories.name: 長文
words: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Practice typing every day to improve your speed and accuracy.
Touch typing is an essential skill in the modern digital age.
Proper finger placement on the home row keys is fundamental.
Regular practice helps develop muscle memory for faster typing.
Focus on accuracy first, then gradually increase your speed.
Keep your wrists elevated and maintain good posture while typing.
Breaking down complex words into smaller parts helps with accuracy.
Consistency is key when learning to touch type effectively.
Set realistic goals and track your progress over time.
